text: The 1992 European Fencing Championships were held in Lisbon, Portugal. The competition consisted of individual events only. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Foil | | | |- |Épée | | | |- |Sabre | | | |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Foil | | | |- |Épée | | | |} ===Medal table=== == References == * Results at the European Fencing Confederation 1992 European Fencing Championships European Fencing Championships Category:International fencing competitions hosted by Portugal
title: 1992 European Fencing Championships
